com.thomsonreuters.upa.valueadd.reactor

Class ReactorConnectInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thomsonreuters.upa.valueadd.reactor.ReactorConnectInfo

  • public class ReactorConnectInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Reactor connection information for use in ReactorConnectOptions.

    • Method Detail

      • connectOptions

        public com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.ConnectOptions connectOptions()
        Returns the ConnectOptions, which is the ConnectOptions associated with the underlying Transport.connect method. This includes information about the host or network to connect to, the type of connection to use, and other transport specific configuration information. This is described in more detail in the UPA Developers Guide.
        Returns:
        the ConnectOptions

      • initTimeout

        public int initTimeout(int timeout)
        The amount of time (in seconds) to wait for the successful initialization of a ReactorChannel. If initialization does not complete in time, an event is dispatched to the application to indicate that the ReactorChannel is down. Timeout must be greater than zero. Default is 60 seconds.
        Parameters:
        timeout - the initialization timeout in seconds
        Returns:
        ReactorReturnCodes.SUCCESS if the timeout is valid, otherwise ReactorReturnCodes.PARAMETER_OUT_OF_RANGE if the timeout is out of range

      • initTimeout

        public int initTimeout()
        Returns the initialization timeout value.
        Returns:
        the initialization timeout value

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears this object for reuse.

      • copy

        public int copy(ReactorConnectInfo destInfo)
        This method will perform a deep copy into the passed in parameter's members from the ReactorConnectInfo calling this method.
        Parameters:
        destInfo - the value getting populated with the values of the calling ReactorConnectInfo
        Returns:
        ReactorReturnCodes.SUCCESS on success, ReactorReturnCodes.FAILURE if the destInfo is null.
